channel.title: r-stats on data+science
channel.description: Recent content in r-stats on data+science

item.title: Gut Microbiome Diversity Visualization
item.description: A short workflow for generating alpha and beta diversity plots using taxonomic gut microbiome data from patients with autoimmune diseases.

item.title: A Case for the Tidyverse
item.description: The tidyverse is a set of actively developed and well-maintained R packages to facilitate the typical data analysis workflow. Here’s why you should use it in your projects.
